title: Marketing
text: So I have used SHEIN for years and  loved it, I still do but they have this game that you will get 10free gifts and I was almost there to get them. I just needed 4cents left. When I check back again, I needed 35 cents. They claim that the person I‚Äôve invited probably didn‚Äôt do a step right but I‚Äôve helped my other friends to do it and it‚Äôs just one click. It‚Äôs really just them marketing for them to get new users. I don‚Äôt leave bad reviews for nothing and I really don‚Äôt do reviews so for me doing this just shows how this app really works. All the mini games they have so you could ‚Äúwin‚Äù is more for them and not you (understandable) but if they are going to go that route and someone is close to winning then they shouldn‚Äôt make people give up hope that they‚Äôll actually win something.

title: Horrible company
text:
STILL waiting for three orders place ages ago. When I went to fill out the survey, even though the app is in English, the entire survey is in Thai. This company is no better than Lazada, which has improved over the years but still allows fake products to be sold on their platform. I am expecting shein to have the same cheap, fake products as well. IF I ever get my orders. I mean this is ridiculous. They probably used the slowest form of shipment that they can possibly use so they can pocket the rest of the shipment fee. This is why it spent over a week in teh country of origin and is taking so long with exporting the products. I think this is the first and last time I'll be using this horrible company. If I used Amazon or lazada I would have had my items by now. Don't believe the Fast Shipping lies. My packages have spent 5 days in customs alone and there hasn't been any movement since and the items STILL haven't left the country of origin yet!
Don't believe me? Just look at their canned responses to people filing grievances. The SAME response each time. It's just copy and paste without any help whatsoever.

title: Doesn‚Äôt show the real price anymore & not enough plus size clothes
text:
I used to love SHEIN but they started showing an ‚Äúestimated price‚Äù instead of the actual cost of things and I absolutely hate this update! I used to enjoy getting my cart within a certain budget range and then applying the discount at the next step and it felt like I was saving money (girl math) but now I don‚Äôt get that and I have also seen a cart price go up when I remove something bc it‚Äôs adjusting the price of every item. Very annoying! 

Because of this I‚Äôve been struggling to order with them bc my brain just doesn‚Äôt like it anymore idk how else to explain 

 I also don‚Äôt like that a lot of the clothes are limited to a size large or xl if you‚Äôre lucky. As someone who recently entered the xl size range it‚Äôs really annoying having to search for entirely different clothes or look in a different section. I wish a lot of their popular clothes would also have plus sizes. Some of them do and you can click a button that says XL-3XL and it takes you to the plus size of that item but that option is very limited. 

Other than that, I‚Äôve been medium happy with my past purchases. Each item is very hit or miss, te quality and the sizing isn‚Äôt consistent.
